Reviews.Title: You can do a lot better
Reviews.Author: Matt "The Mattmeister"
Reviews.Content: Ahhhhh China. I must visit that place someday. While I'm there, I'll take this camera back. Buying a security camera is like buying a mattress - there's a million models and everybody who buys one thinks it's great. My point is: you can't trust reviews. So you'll probably take this one with a grain of salt too. I have been doing video surveillance installations for about 5 years (I have been in the data / I.T./ Low voltage wiring trade for 20 years) and have used a variety of entry level cameras ($150 or less). So here's my honest professional opinion of this camera. Pros: The color rendering was good and it appears to have the stated resolution and lens. Cons: The mount won't allow the camera to tilt to compensate for a compound angle (can't fix the horizon line). The mount doesn't protect the camera cable. Night vision is atrocious - 15 feet at best. It should be priced at about $59.99 retail. Please don't buy this. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good As Stated..So Far
Reviews.Author: Consumer
Reviews.Content: Actually I didn't read where the camera goes to black and white at night.Although the black and white is cystal clear it makes no attempt to go to color with any light source. During the day the wide angle lense offers a sensational wide view of whatever you point it at with crisp colors and great view. This camera make no mistake about it is everything the ad says. This is my first day so I am hoping it continues to operate as stated.

Reviews.Title: Impressive IR performance
Reviews.Author: W. Davis
Reviews.Content: I had 3 wide-angle black & white cameras on my home video surveillance system that I wanted to upgrade.  I decided to order one of these cameras to try.  The resolution is not outstanding, but is much better than my old cameras and much nicer to be in color.  I imagine the electronics in my DVR have some bearing on what the final resolution looks like on the monitor.What I am most amazed by is the performance at night.  I have one camera mounted in a side yard of my house.  At night the yard almost looks like it's daytime.  Two other cameras cover large lawn areas.  I would say that, if it was not for the fact that the cameras are pointed downward because they are wide-angle, they would probably illuminate out to nearly 100 feet.I noticed one of the other reviews made a negative comment about the picture at night not being in color.  It is important to realize that images from a camera that sees in infrared will only be in black & white.  The camera has a light sensor which obviously switches it to infrared when it gets dark.As far as construction quality, I have no complaints.  After I bought the first camera, I bought 2 more.  It's nice to sit at my desk at night and be able to see the areas that my cameras cover.  I am quite happy with this new addition to my home surveillance system.

Reviews.Title: Video security Camera
Reviews.Author: JRM "JRM in Ohio"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit mostly because of the wide angle and the high res features.  I'm using it to monitor my driveway and it's doing just the job I hoped it would do.  It does a fair job with IR, and very clear picture.  Will likely buy another one for another use.  Note that it does not come with long wires.  The power supply is about 5' and that's it.  Likely you'll need to explore some kind of cord to get the video output where you need it.  I'm only rating it as four stars because I've not used it long enough to rate it higher...so far, so good.

Reviews.Title: poorly sealed cam
Reviews.Author: val
Reviews.Content: cam not sealed very well moisture collecting on inside shorted out infra-red then cam went bad 6 weeks old  ,worked well for a short time

Reviews.Title: Best camera so far.
Reviews.Author: Merle
Reviews.Content: I have three different camera's on my system, and this one out performs them all. Very good low light, the 26 LED's seem much brighter than the others which have more LED's. I'll eventually replace the others with this model.

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: BlueMoon
Reviews.Content: Based on the 'positive' reviews, I ordered one but was very disappointed when the item arrived. The construction was cheap quality beside missing mounting hardware. The item was shipped without any padding or protective packaging other than the main cardboard box itself. The picture was jerky and noisy (could be because of damaged during shipment?). We ended up returned it within 24 hours of receipt. The purchase experience with Amazon was good but I would not recommend any VideoSecu products as they are mostly made in China with very low quality.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 700TVL
Reviews.Author: ovnttim
Reviews.Content: The camera has a nice picture but it stop working after 36 days. And it can't be returned.Only gives you 30 Days.I"ll be looking for a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: tkeith_2001
Reviews.Content: I bought these after an incedent at my home. I had two cameras on the front of my house that I had been using for years. They weren't bad 420 Lines of resolution. when I needed to use the video it wasn't as clear as I would've hoped for. So I bought two of these to replace them. These plugged right into the existing cables that I had. The picture is so much clearer and the colors are more true. I have a large light on the front of my house but, even with it turned off I can't hardly tell a difference. I can even see the yard across the street(about 100 feet away). There is a street light two doors down and it provides more than enough light to see everything in front of my house. I'm very happy with these cameras and will be buying more.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 600TVL IR Outdoor Security Camera
Reviews.Author: kimie zajac
Reviews.Content: Has a wide angle view picks up objects from far away. Decent night vision and colors are sharp and true to color also would recommend for an add on to your security system. Thank you Amazon and VideoSecu

Reviews.Title: Not 700tvl beware !!!
Reviews.Author: hannzis
Reviews.Content: They cut prices on this, quality of build did not seem too bad. But the 700TVL NO WAY not even close this was maybe a 400TVL. Put it beside a Sony 700tvl and quality was really evident. Black and white was washed out.Cannot recommend this at all

Reviews.Title: Bummer on the IR device after one rainstorm
Reviews.Author: Phoenecian
Reviews.Content: Super bummed. This is camera number 2 of three that I have bought that had the IR device just give out. After observing droplets, and then opening the camera to find moisture inside the camera after one rainy day. Very bummed and $105.00 of cameras have chosen to leak and crap out. Love the wide field vision and the color is great but if this is what you get after a short period of time, then I will shop elsewhere, unless this is some strange coincidence, and I just got two faulty camera's. Sure would like some warranty on this one at least.

Reviews.Title: Found mosture inside the housing
Reviews.Author: Keith Renn
Reviews.Content: Went to remove some spider webs and found water behind glass window of the camera housing. Picture is good in daylight and good  at night about 20 feet.

Reviews.Title: Got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: david malloy
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this little camera for the price. Got it up, turned it on and day or night it does what I expected for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Quality at the right price
Reviews.Author: Denis Ayers
Reviews.Content: I hesitate writing reviews about electrical and mechanical items right away because how long they last is as important as performance. Well,It's been almost 2 years and this camera has been on 24/7 and it's perfect.Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Company To Deal with
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Medeiros "Daniel M"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this two product  Camera and a DVR Recorder . When I received the recorder I started to have problem with it. Call the seller and they would not replace the unit. Be very careful dealing with this people.

Reviews.Title: i realy wanted to finish the camera setup
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "D. GORDON"
Reviews.Content: but i had to return 2 of this cameras because that it was impossible to recognize a thing.it's like having prescription glasses of -3 -4 and not wearing those glasses.to make sure i connect the camera directly to the tv because i was thinking that it may be my dvr but it was the same bad picture.i also didn't use extended cable to make sure that it was not the cable degrading the image.amazon fulfilled the order in timely manner and there was no problem with that, as well as the return.

Reviews.Title: No quality
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: This camera is no where near 700TVL.Maybe 600 but that is pushing it. The video quality is very poor. I also had interface issues with rolling lines. I checked all the connections and the problem persisted. I returned it the same day of install.

Reviews.Title: 2.5 years mounted on roof and still running strong.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Charlie
Reviews.Content: Was looking for wide angle lens camera to mount outside. I was concerned at first about the weather proofing of the camera seeing as it would have direct contact with the elements.  It sits in the sun, rain, and humidity of florida and hasn't lost feed yet.  Picture quality is sufficient for my purpose and is far better than cameras that come included with DVRs.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Campbell Rice
Reviews.Content: Camera was good for the money, color is good and nightime shows clear enough you can see as far as 50 feet from camera.

Reviews.Title: not ready for use by consumer
Reviews.Author: jacob dijkstra jr
Reviews.Content: unit arrived without the promised power supply . the picture runs because the powersupply needs to be checked and regulated.unit does not send in color . any time. A complete waste of time not user friendly needs special tools (oscilloscope)

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Angela Lane "Brad"
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera to upgrade one bought that did not work  I thought a slight upgrade might improve chances on the second try.. so far product is operational and living up to its sales pitch.  clear picture with an extremely wide field of view  night vission seemed to work fine can see clearly to 30-40 feet larger and shinny objects quite a bit further but not with clarity.read reviews about poor weather proofing so i installed it with a rain cover. Mount is also better than the last. i am gonna be purchasing another soon Well worth the price of 40 bucks dont think you can doo better for the dough

Reviews.Title: Camera review.
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for an old one.  So far its been a good one , no problems and great picture.  For the money nice product so far.

Reviews.Title: A VAST IMPROVEMENT OVER MY OLD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Dandee "Jimmy"
Reviews.Content: This is a huge improvement over my old camera .  Even using my old 480 line recorder that uses standard VGA hookup, it looks so much better than old camera.  It has an  extremely wide angle lens, allowing a much wider field of view.  Images in the distance have a much sharper image.  I can only imagine how much of an improvement it would be to have a high defination recorder with HDMI output with these cameras.

Reviews.Title: good but
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: this is a good camera a 700 TVL-IR ...but hate to say it the same one that's a 420TVL-IR at 20.00 cheaper is just as good ...maybe better so save your money they look the same, u can see the mounting brackets are same ...I do belive the only thing dif. in the sticker that says 420 tvl or 700 tvl ..............so if u want to pay 45.00 buy the 420 tvl.....well worth it

Reviews.Title: True colors and great night video
Reviews.Author: sculin
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the video, both day and night. Able to see over 75 feet with minimal street lighting. I intend to purchase two more for the other side of the house.

Reviews.Title: I see in the night
Reviews.Author: Asa Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I ordered two and found that one is much cleared at night than the other. It could be as to were they are placed and available light . It is good to be able to see all around the outside of the house at night as well as day..

Reviews.Title: Great Resolution Great Night Vision
Reviews.Author: Gee Gnome "Cess Poole"
Reviews.Content: I purchased in 2010, VideoSecu CCTV Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor Indoor Weatherproof Night Vision IR Infrared Free Power Supply C67, with 420 horizontal lines. The night vision is foggy and unacceptable, but the daytime resolution and field of view are great. So I was apprehensive buying this 700VTL upgrade by the same manufacturer because of the night vision. With the discount, free shipping, FBA and Amazon Credit Card points, the total amount for this camera was $52, so I purchased it.It arrived in 2 days, great packaging, awesome resolution and the night vision is high quality. Because I received the camera so quickly, I thought I'd write a positive feedback and product review just as quickly. I'm very impressed with the seller, the product and always a big fan of FBA. The only way to buy.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor video camera
Reviews.Author: Beachmombyron
Reviews.Content: Works good but not quite as clear as the other brands I have purchased in the past, however for the price it is a good camera and buy.

Reviews.Title: 600tvl wide angle came
Reviews.Author: top hat
Reviews.Content: the wide angle view of the camera was why I purchased this camera for, and cleaner picture imagine upgarde form 480tvl camera [nice] looking to replace one more camera with the 600tvl wide view angle

Reviews.Title: Got more then I payed for.
Reviews.Author: Cappy54
Reviews.Content: Did not really know what this would be like. Have bought different cameras like this and ... well they worked. I mean nothing to write home about. This one was a step up and maybe adding another 2 to our sustem. Good bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Oldgizman
Reviews.Content: This camera has functioned extremely well for the last 6 months. The picture quality is much better than the comparable Swann cams that came with my system. One of the cameras that came with my Swann Defender system was defective and it took almost 3 months to get them to replace it so I bought this cam in July as a replacement. I recieved the Swann cam but prefer this one. As I purchased a Swann DVR system with 4 cams but an 8 cam DVR I will be purchasing a few more of these. The night vision is also far better on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Simon F. Rodehn
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately at this price one cannot expect better quality with the general materials. For this reason it looses a star. On the other hand it has amazing resolution and clarity outside both in the daytime and under artificial light. The color is good and the mount is better than most at this price level. The wide angle is a great improvement for my system and has sold me on the idea of buying another half dozen to compliment the views that I already have.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: MPB West Hills
Reviews.Content: I bought 5 of these 420 TV Line cameras. Installation is easy. It's just a few screws. Running the wires is the hard part. You must buy the wires and DVR separately. The image quality is medium. I also bought one camera that is 720 TV Lines and it is a little more clear than this one. The wide angle is good for my front door and back yard areas. I also have one in my dark garage. The night vision works pretty well. You won't be able to read a license plate with this camera, but the quality is good enough.Note - one of the five cameras is blurry. I will return that one. The other four are good.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 600TVL Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Codeweaver
Reviews.Content: The camera is not as clear as I'd like it to be.  Part of the problem, I believe, is because it is a wide view lens which distorts the image a little.  Otherwise it is usable and can view a lot more of my driveway than other cameras.

Reviews.Title: A great disappointment
Reviews.Author: Eden
Reviews.Content: Very poor quality. First, the item was shipped without the supposedly included power supply. It was also missing the mounting bracket. Second, the video connector failed. I had to use an appropriate power supply (12V) to substitute for the missing item,just to test out the camera. Quality of the video was disappointing and too much flickering and noises. I would now stop making any purchase from VideoSecu as their products have consistently been very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Not really worth the money
Reviews.Author: JEL
Reviews.Content: We had purchased 2 VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Security Camera Infrared Weatherproof CCTV Home 1/3" CCD 420 TV Lines 28 IR LEDs Wide View Angle Lens with Free Power Supply A71 previously and I thought this would be even better so I ordered one to replace those previously purchased  . On our QT528 system this camera does not show any significant improvement  over the VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Security Camera Infrared Weatherproof CCTV Home 1/3" CCD 420 TV Lines 28 IR LEDs Wide View Angle Lens with Free Power Supply A71 that I purchased for half the price. Night vision is poorer and even with the higher resolution it does not seem to focus any better on objects more than 10 feet away. I think I will go back to using the cheaper VideoSec model.  The best overall camera we have purchased on Amazon  is a QSC48030 which at the time I purchased it was $99.00 with free (Prime) shipping  Q-See QSC48030 High Resolution Weatherproof CCD Camera w/80ft of Night Vision (Color)This is not a "bad" camera, it has been working OK for over a month, and may even hold up better than the $44.00 model  I just do not think it is much better  and  not worth twice as much.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powered by 1/3" Sony Effio CCD Technology, Color DSP image sensor
700TV lines high resolution. Weatherproof housing
Build-in 3.6mm lens for wide view. 0 lux with IR LED
28 built-in long range IR illuminators. All metal weatherproof housing and bracket
12V DC 500mA power supply and bonus warning decal included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 700TVL IR Outdoor Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD Weatherproof Day Night Vision 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens CCTV Camera for DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Power Supply IR45HE WM5
